Nova.Avalonia.UI

Enum QRErrorCorrectionLevel

Namespace
Nova.Avalonia.UI.BarcodeGenerator
Assembly
Nova.Avalonia.UI.BarcodeGenerator.dll

Error correction levels for QR codes. Higher levels allow more damage recovery but reduce data capacity.

public enum QRErrorCorrectionLevel

Fields

H = 3

High - 30% error recovery capacity (recommended for logo overlay)

L = 0

Low - 7% error recovery capacity

M = 1

Medium - 15% error recovery capacity (default)

Q = 2

Quartile - 25% error recovery capacity
